text:
The linked page makes no mention of wildcard support, while the examples at
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/vhosts/name-based.html have a wildcard in that
directive. Checking the source, it looks like it supports both * and ? as wildcards.
creator: vericgar@gentoo.org
takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
